title: The Curse of Buddy Holly - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/3/20
itunes:title: The Curse of Buddy Holly - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/3/20
description:
George Noory and rock and roll historian Susan Masino discuss the plane crash that killed pioneering rock stars Buddy Holly, Ritchie Valens and the Big Bopper in 1959, and how many other people connected to them but not on the plane died as well under mysterious circumstances.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An investigation into the mysterious deaths surrounding the infamous Rock N Roll plane crash.
